document.full_text: the resignation of a key lieutenant this week could damage the credit quality of warren buffett's berkshire hathaway  , moody's investors service said on friday.
document.title: sokol affair "credit negative" for berkshire: moody's
lines_and_colors: the resignation of a key lieutenant this week could damage the credit quality of warren buffett's berkshire hathaway  , moody's investors service said on friday.
